Orlebar Brown

The standard approach to delivering designs was turned on its head for Orlebar Brown. Instead of a whole set of page designs, an automated design system was fed with a detailed styleguide to effectively automate page designs. This allows for a rapid turn around, reducing required design time by around 40%.

Product Detail Page

Bolder UI

Use of bold typography, thick outlined UI elements and strong colours is used to fit with Orlebar Brown's wish for a more confident digital presence
